original_text: I am afraid about you. I worked very much to help you. I do not want my work to have no results.
korean_text: 내가 너희를 위하여 수고한 것이 헛될까 두려워하노라

sentences.original_text: I worked very much to help you.
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 당신을 돕기 위해 매우 열심히 일했습니다.

sentences.original_text: I do not want my work to have no results.
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 내 일이 아무런 결과를 내지 않기를 원치 않습니다.
